EmailTemplate.name: CHN-2017-12 Turbonomic Partner Accreditation Training Denver.Email Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: Turbonomic Partner Accreditation Training Denver
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
We're thrilled to have you join us on Thursday for #VMTurbofest London!
Details Date Location Address
- Registration begins at 12:15 in the lobby - Attire is smart casual - All registered guests will receive a VMTurbo computer bag - Turbofest will start promptly at 1:00 PM and full agenda can be accessed here <[[http://vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/turbofestLondon2016_AgendaPDF16_5.pdf]]> - Presentations end at 6:00 PM, followed by networking and cocktails
Please do not hesitate to reach out to us with any and all questions; our contact information can be found below.
We look forward to seeing you!
-The VMTurbo Team
